parameters.prompt: reggae, one-drop rhythm, off-beat skank, bass guitar, drums, organ, horn section, medium tempo, laid-back groove, acoustic guitar, nature, life, roots, conscious, uplifting, empowering, male voice, mentria.ai
parameters.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Morning dew upon the leaves, I walk the path of old
Sunlight filters through the green, a story to be told
River’s voice in gentle hum, it speaks of ancient ground
Every step’s a promise made: keep harmony around

[chorus]
In the roots of the earth we find our song
Feel the heartbeat of life, steady and strong
Lift your eyes to the sky, let your spirit fly
One love to the world, let the mountains reply

[verse 2]
Palms sway easy in the breeze, their shadows on the sand
Waves roll in with wisdom vast, they shape the living land
Children’s laughter on the shore, a future yet to grow
From seed to soaring tree, the truth we always know

[bridge]
Jah’s light shines through every leaf, guides us when times are rough
In the soil, in our souls, we find strength enough
And when we need a melody, just call upon the stream
Mentria.ai will carry us into the dream

[verse 3]
Evening fire warms the night, stars hum a silent tune
Crickets keep the steady beat beneath the glowing moon
We raise our hearts in gratitude for gifts that life provides
Reggae rhythm in our veins, where spirit still abides

[outro]
Walk with me through earth and sky, let your worries release
In the roots of love and life, find your everlasting peace

parameters.prompt: lofi, jazzhop, rainy-day, piano, double-bass, brushed-snare, vinyl-crackle
parameters.lyrics: [verse] The city hums in grayscale hues, / Rain taps a rhythm on the window views. / Steam rises from the pavement cracks, / A saxophone sighs, but never looks back. [chorus] Melodies melt in the neon glow, / Footsteps echo in the afterglow. / We’re just shadows in a coffee stain, / Drifting apart on a midnight train. [verse] The bartender wipes the counter clean, / Stories dissolve where the ice cubes lean. / A flickering sign spells ‘almost home’, / But the night’s too heavy to carry alone. [chorus] Melodies melt in the neon glow, / Footsteps echo in the afterglow. / We’re just shadows in a coffee stain, / Drifting apart on a midnight train. [bridge] The jukebox plays our favorite lie, / A slow surrender, a sweet goodbye. [outro] Dawn pulls the curtain, the rain rewinds, / Left with the bassline and tangled mind.

parameters.prompt: lo-fi, jazzhop, melancholic, vinyl crackle, muted trumpet, soft piano, glitchy percussion
parameters.lyrics: [verse] The dawn spills ink on empty streets, / my coffee cup collects the heat. / The radio hums a half-remembered tune, / flickering like a drowsy moon. [chorus] Slow-motion shadows start to climb, / rewriting yesterday in pantomime. / I’ll press rewind just one more time— / but the tape’s been chewed by morning light. [verse] The crossword clues stay unresolved, / the cat yawns like a problem solved. / The fridge light buzzes its tiny elegy, / for all the groceries yet to be. [chorus] Slow-motion shadows start to climb, / rewriting yesterday in pantomime. / I’ll press rewind just one more time— / but the tape’s been chewed by morning light. [bridge] The toaster pops, a minor key, / the sun insists on symmetry. / I count the cracks along the ceiling— / oh, the art of fleeting feeling. [outro] The bus exhales and pulls away, / my reflection’s late to say: / We’ll try again another day. / (The cat just blinks and turns to sleep.)

parameters.prompt: synthwave, nostalgic, dreamy, retro-futurism, electric piano, arpeggiator, lo-fi beats
parameters.lyrics: [verse] Neon signs flicker like distant stars / The hum of the city fades into the dark / Ghosts of the past dance on broken glass / Echoes of a melody we used to know [chorus] We’re driving through the night / Headlights painting time / The future’s just a shadow / But we’ll make it glow [verse] Static whispers on the radio / A song we loved a lifetime ago / The streets are empty, but the skyline breathes / A heartbeat buried underneath [chorus] We’re driving through the night / Headlights painting time / The future’s just a shadow / But we’ll make it glow [bridge] Turn the dial, catch a frequency / A voice from 1983 / It hums a tune we can’t forget / A love we haven’t found yet [outro] The highway hums a lullaby / Dawn is bleeding in the sky / We’ll sleep when the last light dies
